
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;


void function(int a[], int n )
{
int b[5000] ;
    if(n%2==0)
    {
       for(int i=0;i<n;i+=2)
               { b[(i/2)]=a[i];}
    }
    
    else if(n%2==1)
    {for(int i=2;i<n;i+=2)
          {   b[(i/2)-1]=a[i];}
    }
    
    if(n==1)
    printf("%d\n",a[0]);
    else
    function(b,n/2);
     
}

int main()
{

    int a[10000],n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    a[i]=(i+1);
    
    function(a,n);
        
    system("pause");
    return 0;
    
}
